name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WP-Search - WordPress Theme, Plugin, Hosting Detector

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect WordPress theme, plugins, hosting. Additionally, it can also detect CMS such as Wix, Squarespace, Shopify, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WP-Search can detect WordPress theme, plugins and hosting used on a website with high accuracy.

The analyzed websites are categorized into WordPress themes, plugins, servers, and can be used as a showcase of website examples.

It is a free tool for analyzing public information on websites.

- WordPress Theme
- WordPress Plugins
- Hosting (Shared, VPS, Cloud, etc.)
- CMS
- Language / Country
- TLD (Top Level Domain)
- Page Speed
- Type (Blog, Corporate, Ecommerce)
- Color
